ComicInfo.Summary: Five short stories comprise this issue of the heady anthology from EROS Comix. In "Wishin' All My Exes Lived in Texas," a lucky husband has a wife and an ex with benefits. "Dropping Off the Babysitter" probably doesn't need any explanation. A couple of lucky nephews discover that "Aunties Love Rock Hard Candies." In "Honey I'm Home," a girlfriend discovers her man in flagrante with the girl next door and decides to join in. And wrapping up, in the evocatively titled "F--- You" the girlfriend in a fighting couple decides to take her revenge by taking on the first guy she meets on the street... make that two guys! As always, it's the comic series that sucks â€” in the good way.
